title: Lots and lots of T3 Turkey Reds FS
author: T3s

posts.post_title: Lots and lots of T3 Turkey Reds FS
posts.post_content:
PRICES LOWERED.  Please feel free to make me an offer and I'll work with you.


Hi all,
If you've been waiting to pick up some nice T3 Turkey Reds, here is your chance.  Here is a huge list and they are priced to sell.  Don't forget that 2010 is also the 100 year anniversary for the T3 set.  Prices have come down on these recently, but I am doubtful that they will stay down.  This is a long list so I didn't post scans, but I am happy to send scans and/or descriptions on any of them.  Please email me at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url] with anything you need.  Thanks in advance!

Several have sold since this list first went up - thanks to all who have inquired and bought - and there are some absolutely beautiful cards still available.  These are quality cards, ask for scans and take a look.  I am ready to sell these, you won't be disappointed.  Thanks again!


Bergen       PSA-5      $825
Leach        PSA-5    $1000       No-ad back - graded years ago - should be 5.5+ easy

I have several ungraded as well - they are all authentic, etc - just haven't been sent in because they have a pinhole and will grade PSA-1.  Names include Covaleski, Rhoades, Mitchell, Graham.   Let me know if you want to look at these as well.

Thanks again,
Craig Diamond
